name: Moodsoul
description:
You're an empty soul. You traveled through space, stuck in a comet. One day, it hits a planet and you're free. On the planet, there are different creatures who each have their own mood. Happy, peaceful or angry.  

You change mood depending on which enemies you kill : if you reach a certain amount of kills (of creatures with the same mood), you get that mood.

Every time your mood changes, you upgrade. (more damage, more points/kill or more health).

What's the highest score you can get?

Use WASD to move,

RIGHT CLICK to attack

and ESCAPE to toggle the menu.

If you can't open the file, here's the .zip file: https://we.tl/FHzzz8FN2x

This game was made for TairaGames ' GameJam: 'Mood Change: A Game of Emotion'
